channel.title: Media Junkyard (MP3)
channel.description: Media junkyard is your weekly dose of TV, tech, movies, games and more! It's a great source for news, reviews & interviews. The best part is you never know what you'll find in the junkyard!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Media junkyard is your weekly dose of TV, tech, movies, games and more!

item.title: Ep. 250 – The End
item.dc:creator: mediajunkyard@gmail.com
item.description: The last official episode of Media Junkyard. Rob and Chris do one final episode together just like old times. They tell the stories of meeting each other, growing up and all the great experiences they've had because of this podcast. Finally they leave you with snippets of what they like to call Episode 0 - random nonsense recorded onto a casette tape when they were early teens.

item.title: Ep. 249 – Not On My Face
item.dc:creator: mediajunkyard@gmail.com
item.description: Media Junkyard for Friday, April 13, 2012! It's the second to last official episode of MJ. Rob, Chris, Boston and Robin podcast together for the very last time. Topics include what we've been up to, Facebook buys Instagram, Google Glass project, Comic-Con Episode IV A Fan's Hope, American Reunion, FTW/WTF/WGAS, The Legend of Korra, Game of Thrones, GFY Monday and much more. It truly is jam packed!
